author: James Walker
title: China's U.S. Ambassador Splits With Foreign Ministry Spokesperson Over 'Crazy' COVID-19 Theory
description: Cui Tiankai said he stood by a February statement in which he said it was "crazy" to peddle theories that the virus began in a U.S. military lab.
content:
The Chinese ambassador to the United States has split with a spokesman for his country's foreign ministry, confirming that he still believed it was "crazy" to say COVID-19 was created in an American lab.
Ambassador Cui Tiankai told Axios on HBO that his posi… [+3445 chars]
